name: Dicest Dungeon
description:
In dicest dungeon you have to bet(tle) your way through a shady casino depending exclusive on your dice rolls to survive.

Controls: 

A/D or LeftArrow/RightArrow - Move

The game is definetly a little rough in a lot of aspects due to time constraints, so it may serve more as a "prototype".

Definetly the most fun we've had on a Game Jam and we'll probably pick this up again to polish and expand on our original ideas (since a lot of it had to be cut down from the "final" version).
